org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.layers

Interface LayerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFLyrRaster, DefaultGraphicLayer, DefaultPortableViewLayersEditor, DefaultPortableViewToc, EditionManager, EventBuffer, FLayers, FLayers, FLyrBingMaps, FLyrDefault, FLyrGoogleMaps, FLyrOSM, FLyrVect, FLyrVect, FLyrWCS, FLyrWMS, FLyrWMTS, MapSheetsGrid, SelectionCount

    public interface LayerListener

    LayerListener defines the interface for an object that listens to changes in a layer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activationChanged(LayerEvent e)
      Called when the activation of a layer has changed.
      void drawValueChanged(LayerEvent e)
      Called when a draw value of a layer has changed.
      void editionChanged(LayerEvent e)
      Called when the edition of a layer has changed.
      void nameChanged(LayerEvent e)
      Called when the name of a layer has changed.
      void visibilityChanged(LayerEvent e)
      Called when the visibility of a layer has changed.
